casebody.data:
STATE ex rel. UTILITIES COM'N
v.
CP&L. No. 649A03-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 20, 2006. Edward S. Finley, Jr., Christopher J. Ayers, Robert B. Schwentker, Thomas K. Austin, Raleigh, Kodwo Ghartey-Tagoe, Charlotte, for Duke Power & NC Elec. Memb. Leonard G. Green, Assistant Attorney General, for Attorney General. Antoinette R. Wike, Raleigh, for Public Staff-Utilities Comm. Thomas R. West, Pamela A. Scott, Raleigh, Michael S. Colo, Rocky Mount, for Municipal Power Agency. Carson Carmichael, Ralph McDonald, Raleigh, for Carolina Industrial Groups. James P. West, Raleigh, for Carolina Utilities Cus. Asso.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of April 2006 by Appellants (NCMPA # 1 and NCEMPA) to Withdraw Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of April 2006."
